page.publish: Your page has been successfully published.
page.setToPrivate: The page has been successfully set to 'Private'.
page.unlinked: The link has been successfully removed.
page.addedToPersonalWiki: The page was successfully added to your wiki.
page.saveImage: The new image has been saved.
page.convertedToWiki: The page '{name}' was successfully converted into a wiki.
page.convertedToPage: The wiki '{name}' was successfully converted into a page.

question.flashcardsAdded: One flashcard was added | {count} flashcards were added.

user.profileUpdate: Your new profile data has been successfully saved.
user.passwordChanged: Your password has been successfully changed.
user.passwordVerificationMailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
user.supportLoginUpdated: Your support login details have been successfully updated.
user.wuwiVisibilityUpdated: Your knowledge wishlist settings have been successfully updated.

collaboration.connected: You are viewing the live version of this page.

subscription.cantAddKnowledge: You can't add any more knowledge wishlist entries in the free version. Purchase a Plus membership for unlimited knowledge wishlist entries.
subscription.cantSavePrivateQuestion: You can't add any more private questions in the free version. Purchase a Plus membership for unlimited private questions.
subscription.cantSavePrivatePage: You can't add any more private pages in the free version. Purchase a Plus membership for unlimited private pages.

page.parentIsPrivate: Publishing is not possible. The parent page is private.
page.publicChildPages: This page has public child pages.
page.notLastChild: This page cannot be deleted because it has additional child pages. Please remove all subpages and try again.
page.noRemainingParents: The page link cannot be removed. This page must be linked to at least one public parent page.
page.parentIsRoot: Under 'Global Wiki', you may only add private pages.
page.loopLink: Pages cannot be subpages of themselves.
page.isAlreadyLinkedAsChild: This page is already linked as a child.
page.isNotAChild: This page is already not a subpage.
page.isLinkedInNonWuwi: You have already added this page outside of your knowledge wishlist. Please disable 'Show only your knowledge wishlist' and add this page to your knowledge wishlist.
page.childIsParent: Parent pages cannot be assigned as subpages.
page.nameIsTaken: is already taken, please choose a different name!
page.nameIsForbidden: is forbidden, please choose a different name!
page.rootPageMustBePublic: The root page cannot be set to private.
page.missingRights: You do not have the necessary rights.
page.tooPopular: This page is included in too many other users' knowledge wishlists.
page.saveImageError: The image could not be saved.
page.circularReference: The parent page cannot be assigned as a subpage.
page.newPageIdIsPageIdToBeDeleted: The selected page cannot be the page that is to be deleted.
page.noChildSelected: You haven't selected a child page.

question.missingAnswer: The answer to the question is missing.
question.save: Your question could not be saved.
question.creation: Your question could not be created.
question.isInWuwi: The question cannot be deleted because it is part of {count} other users' knowledge wishlist. Please contact us if you believe the question should still be deleted.
question.rights: You lack the permission to do so.
question.errorOnDelete: An error has occurred! References to the question (learning sessions, appointments, knowledge wishlist entries, etc.) may have been partially deleted.
question.couldNotAddFlashcards: The flashcards could not be added.

user.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
user.falseEmailFormat: The email address format is invalid
user.passwordIsWrong: Incorrect password. Please re-enter the password.
user.samePassword: The new password is the same as the old one. Please enter a new password.
user.passwordNotCorrectlyRepeated: The repeated password doesn't match your new password input.
user.passwordResetTokenIsInvalid: The link is invalid. If you have any issues, please send us an email at team(at)memucho.de.
user.doesNotExist: The specified user was not found. Please check if your login details are correct.
user.invalidFBToken: Hey! It seems like the Facebook token you entered isn't correct. Try logging in again with Facebook. If it still doesn't work, just contact us. We'll be happy to help!
user.emailIsInvalid: {email} is not a valid email address.
user.passwordTooShort: The password should be at least 5 characters long.
user.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email address and password.

error.default: Unfortunately, an unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

route.notFound: Oh no! This page does not exist.
route.noRights: This page is private. You don't have permission to view it.
route.unauthorized: You are not logged in. You may not have access to this page for that reason.

image.tooBig: The image is too large. The file size must not exceed 1MB.

learningSession.noQuestionsAvailableWithCurrentConfig: No questions are available for these settings. Please change the knowledge status or select all questions.

body.title: An unexpected error has occurred.
body.suggestion: Reloading the website might fix the problem.

collaboration.couldNotConnect: The connection to the live version could not be established.
collaboration.connectionLost: The connection to the live version was lost.

ai.noFlashcardsCreatedCauseLimitAndPageIsPr: Oops, you've reached your limit! Because the page is private, no flashcards were created.

page.toggleHideText: Disable text input for a pure navigation page without text content. Only available for pages with no text content.

question.newQuestionNotInFilter: Attention: The question will not be displayed to you after creation because the chosen options do not match the filter settings. Adjust the learning filter to display the question.
question.notInFilter: The question cannot be displayed with your question filter.
question.isPrivate: The question is private. Please log in.
question.notInPage: The question is not included on the page.

feed.private: Only you can see this entry.

ai.flashcardsCreatedWillBePublicCauseLimit: Limit for private flashcards reached. New cards will be created publicly.

register.title: Register

deleteProfile.onlyIf: You can only delete your profile if:
deleteProfile.condition1: the total number of public views is under 2000,
deleteProfile.condition2: and there are no remaining pages or questions that would be left incorrectly assigned.
deleteProfile.notPossible: Unfortunately, it's not possible to delete your profile on your own. Therefore, please send us a short email at
deleteProfile.contactReason: so that we can secure your valuable knowledge and remove your profile for you.

wuwi.explanation: If selected, it will be publicly visible which questions are in your knowledge wishlist (except for private questions). Answer statistics will not be displayed.

supportLogin.explanation: Attention: This is only necessary after consulting with the memoWikis team! If you enable support login, memoWikis staff can log into your user account for troubleshooting or support without needing or seeing your password.
